original_text: When the inhabitants of the land, the Canaanites, saw the mourning on the threshing floor of Atad, they said, “This is a grievous mourning by the Egyptians.” Therefore the place was named Abel-mizraim; it is beyond the Jordan.
korean_text: 그 땅 거민 가나안 백성들이 아닷 마당의 애통을 보고 이르되 이는 애굽 사람의 큰 애통이라 하였으므로 그 땅 이름을 아벨미스라임이라 하였으니 곧 요단 강 건너편이더라

sentences.original_text: When the inhabitants of the land,
saw the mourning on the threshing floor of Atad,
“This is a grievous mourning by the Egyptians.”
Therefore the place was named Abel-mizraim;
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그 곳의 이름을 아벨미스라임이라 불렀으니,
